header.title: Missing co-negative form after negative verb.

body.description: The negative verb "$1" should be followed by a co-negative form.
The word "$1" is in the wrong case.
The proper noun "$1" should begin with a capital letter.

examples.ex: Bengtsson {ráđastattai} sávnnjiid.
Bengtsson {rađastalai} visot omiid.
Bengtsson {rikkastattai} doppe.
Mu bahta nu {rikkástaddá}.
Bengtsson {rikkastallai} doppe.
Mu bahta nu {rikkástallá}.
Bengtsson {gierástattai} sin.
Bengtsson {gierastattai} suinna.

body.description: The word "$1" is wrong, it should be "".
The case of word "$1" should be genitive.

examples.ex: Mii leat dávjá ságastallan dan {diŋga} birra.

body.description: The case of word "$1" should be genitive.

examples.ex: Ale diškkut čázi gasku {gonagas}.

body.description: The case of word "$1" should be genitive or accusative.
"$1" galggašii leat genetiiva dahje akkusatiiva kásusis.

examples.ex: Min viessu lea {viđainlot} mehtera alu.
Mun in dieđe manne nu lei, muhto goit dál juo dieđán fárgga {oaččun} loana dahje stipeanda.
Go ná dáhpáhuvvá, álgá olmmoš jurddašit {lea} veara bidjat áiggi dákkár bargui, lohká Sara.
Olmmái muitala ahte son lea ohcame Soria-Moria sloahta, ja jearrala vel áhkus {ii} son dieđe gos dat báiki lea.
Son jearrala dan guovtti njuvččas ahte {diehtiba} soai gos Soria-Moria sloahtta lea.

body.description: The case of word "$1" should be accusative.

examples.ex: Ándde lea munnje {guovtti} ruvnnu velggolaš.

body.description: The case of word "$1" should be accusative.

examples.ex: Máhtte lea {viđa} jagi nuorat go mun.
Dat šattai {guovtti} mehtera guhkit go galggašii.
Son vuvddii daid bohccuid {viđa} ruvnno hálbbibui.
Dat šattai {guovtti} mehtera guhkit go galggašii.

header.title: Locative instead of comitative plural
Lokatiiva dan sájis go máŋggaidlogu komitatiiva

body.description: The case of word "$1" should be locative.

examples.ex: Muhtimat olggobeale {olbmuiguin} dadjet ahte ii leat dárbu loddet.

body.description: The case of word "$1" should be locative.

examples.ex: Vaikko eanaš oassi {olbmuid} eai liiko sudno politihkkii, de dan eaba válde vuhtii Putin ja Medvedev.

body.description: The number of word "$1" should be singular.

examples.ex: Veagat {guvttiiguin} mánáiguin.
Veagat {golmmaiguin} dahje eanet mánáiguin.

body.description: If you use an -ot passive, you cannot use an agent in locative ("$1").
Go geavahat -ot passiivva, de it sáhtte geavahit lokatiivva ageantta ("$1").

examples.ex: Eanan gos barta čuožžu, eaiggáduvvo viđa {olbmos}, namalassii dan golbma vieljažiin, daid {oappás} ja sin {neabis}.

header.title: hallat passive should have an illative agent
hallat passiiva galgá illatiivva ageanttain

body.description: If you use an -hallat passive, you have to use an agent in illative case ("$1").
Go geavahat -hallat passiivva, de ferte geavahit illatiivva ageantta ("$1").

examples.ex: Prospero lea herttot Milanos Itálias, muhto rivvehallá {vieljastis} válddi.
Sámi álbmot, earenoamážit boazodoallu lea hirbmadit cuiggohallan dáža {mediain} go mahkká billistit luonddu.

header.title: the verb should not be an infinitive
vearba ii galgga leat infinitiiva

body.description: The verb ("$1") should not be an infinitive.

examples.ex: Eadni balai mánás {leat} golgodávdda.

header.title: the verb should not be an actio essive
vearba ii galgga leat aktio essiiva

body.description: The verb ("$1") should not be an actio essive, but an infinitive.
Vearba ("$1") ii galgga leat aktio essiiva muhto infinitiiva.

examples.ex: Lávejit nu máilmmi fiidnat {orrome} diet doahpagat.

header.title: the verb should be a form of "eallit"
vearba galgá leat "eallit" hápmi

examples.ex: Dat gii {ealla} beassá dan vásihit.
Stuorámus ealli máilmmis mii {ealla} goikásis, dahje eatnan alde.

header.title: the verb should be a form of "orrut"
vearba galgá leat "orrut" hápmi

examples.ex: Lávejit nu máilmmi fiidnát {orrome} diet doahpagat.

header.title: the verb should be a form of "oastit"
vearba galgá leat "oastit" hápmi

examples.ex: Dat lei divrras {oasttit} áibbas ođđa pláhta, muhto lei dan veara.
Lea oainnat nu ahte bohtet Suoma bealde deikke {oasttit} guliid.
Beaivet lea dábálaš váccašit márkanis, guovlat mii fállojuvvo, ja soaitá vel {oasttit} dujiid, biepmuid dahje eará.

Jos mis livčče basttat, de fitnodat livčče ferten {oasttit} mis bálvalusaid ja mii leimmet beassat dalle ieža mearredit goas min mielas lea buoremussan gáldet iežamet bohccuid, čilge namahis boazodoalli.

header.title: the adjective should have the superlative form
adjektiivvas galgá leat superlatiivahápmi

body.description: Instead of using "eanemus", you should inflect the adjective "$1" for superlative.
Dan sájis go geavahit "eanemus", galggašii sojahit adjektiivva "$1" superlatiivahámis.

examples.ex: Earet eará Guovdageainnu {eanemus} eksohtalaš sajis, Juhls Silver Gallerys, dánsunoahpaheaddjis, Beyoncés ja orodettiin Ođđa Zealánddas.
Danne lea {eanemus} lunddolaš earuhit iešguđet doaimmaid maid Sámediggi čađaha.
Logut maid geavahit kápihttalis, leat goitge dat maid atnit {eanemus} rievttes lohkun mat leat oažžumis dássážii.
Figuvra 3.10 čájeha ahte Lulli-Trøndelagas // Hedemárkkus lea leamašan {eanemus} bissovaš ja alimus gaskamearálaš lohku bohccot juohke siidaoasis dán áigodagas ( 1990-2008 ).

header.title: the adjective should have the comparative form
adjektiiva galgá leat komparatiivahámis

body.description: Instead of using "eanet"/"eambbo", you should inflect the adjective "$1" for comparative.
Dan sájis go geavahit "eanet"/"eambbo", galggašii sojahit adjektiivva "$1" komparatiivahámis.

examples.ex: Ramones váikkuhusas Blackfire musihkii ii leat eahpádus, vaikko Blackfire vuohki leage {eanet} aggressiiva go ovdagovastis.

body.description: "$1" should be a form of boahtit

examples.ex: Mun in jáhkke ahte politihkka rievda jus mun {boađan} jienástit.

body.description: "$1" should be a form of lohkat

examples.ex: Dakkár girjjit maid earát leat {lohkán} báddái vai don ieš it galgga dárbbašit daid bustávaid lohkat.

header.title: real word error, double consonant error (sáhkki)

body.description: "$1" should be a form of sáhkki

examples.ex: Leatgo {sáhkii}?

header.title: real word error, double consonant error (muhtin)

body.description: "$1" should be a form of muhtin

examples.ex: Juos {muhttin} áššit šaddet hui beakkánat, daidda vuođđuduvvo iežas digáštallanforum.

header.title: real word error, double consonant or accent error (guhká)

body.description: "$1" should be a form of guhká

examples.ex: Ráhkisvuohta gal ii bistán beare {guhkká}, muhto ráhkisvuohta musihkkii buolligođii fas gulul.
{Guhka} lean smiehtan rahkadit dakkár borramuš, muhto dušše odne ollašuvvai smavvá niehku.
Go luoikanáigi lea nohkan, galget girjjit/mediat buktot {ruovttuluotta}.
Jus ii buvtte {ruovttuluotta} áigemeari sisa, de sáddejuvvo buhtadusgáibádus girjjiin dehe eará mediain maid leš luoikkahan girjerádjosis.

body.description: "$1" should be a form of sádji

examples.ex: Luoikkaheaddjis lea maid vejolaš oastit seammalágán girjji {sádjái}.
